overview:
Co-founder and managing partner of Earlybird; Board member of EVCA and chairman of the EVCA Venture Capital Platform Council

More than 16 years experience as investor and entrepreneur; focus on web-enabled services

Most successful exits: Dianoema (Milan: NOE.MI); element 5 to Digital River (NASDAQ:DRIV); dooyoo.de to Le Guide.com S.A. Board member of B2X Care Solutions, conject, nfon, and carpooling.com; chairman of the board of simfy

Co-founder of GMM; project manager of EADS (Messerschmidt Boelkow-Blohm); partner with McKinsey & Co. Dipl.-Ing. (Msc equivalent) and PhD in Aerospace Engineering, Technical University of Munich
